item.title: UW Debate Vlog — Vietnam WUDC 2024
item.description: I spent the winter break in Vietnam competing at the World Universities Debating Championship 2024, and also filmed a vlog for it!

item.title: 2A — Random Life Updates
item.description: How we spend our days is, of course, how we spend our lives.

item.title: Waterloo Debate Vlog — McGill Central Canadian Novice Championship 2023
item.description: Last weekend, The UW Debate Society went to McGill Canadian Central Novice Championship 2023 and had a great time!

item.title: A Case for Digital Minimalism
item.description: A while ago, I was reading The Anthropocene Reviewed by John Green, and came across this footnote.

item.title: AI vs. Creative Writing
item.description: While I was writing a Facebook post introducing my friend David as director of a debate tournament, I started thinking about the creative writing process and whether AI would be able to do it or not.

item.title: Three Golden Tips for the Waterloo AIF
item.description: If you implement these three tips, you will increase your chances of being accepted.

item.title: What I Learned From My First Term at UWaterloo
item.description: This is what I learned about studying and lifestyle during my first study term in Software Engineering at Waterloo!

item.title: Why We Should Be Together
item.description: Please read: this is not about relationships.
